snippet: The arrest of an Anonymous leader rocks the the hacker community as law enforcement appears to gain an edge. Whether this will temper the larger hacker cause remains to be seen. Anonymous is a decentralized movement that is, broadly speaking, opposed...
abstract: The arrest of an Anonymous leader rocks the the hacker community as law enforcement appears to gain an edge. Whether this will temper the larger hacker cause remains to be seen. Anonymous is a decentralized movement that is, broadly speaking, opposed to state institutions and the companies that work with them, and its members have embraced an ever-shifting variety of causes. The ranks are steadily replenished with people of varying skills.

headline.main: Daily Report: Hackers Can't Trust Their Own
